name: BrightSphere Investment Group Inc.
description: BrightSphere Investment Group Inc. is a global asset management company that focuses on delivering a wide range of investment solutions to institutional and retail clients. Founded in 2018, BrightSphere operates through a diverse set of investment affiliates, each with its own unique investment strategies and expertise. The company’s mission is to provide innovative and customized investment solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients. BrightSphere's affiliates manage assets across various asset classes, including equity, fixed income, and alternative investments, leveraging a multi-boutique approach to enhance value creation. Committed to transparency and integrity, BrightSphere emphasizes a client-centric approach, ensuring that the investment strategies are aligned with the financial goals of their clients. The firm has a strong focus on sustainable investing, incorporating environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment processes. With a growing global presence, BrightSphere is dedicated to fostering long-term relationships with its clients and partners, aiming to help them achieve their financial objectives while navigating the complexities of the financial markets.
